name: lubaPressable
description: Makes any view tappable with scale animation, haptic feedback, and press state tracking. The foundational interaction primitive.
composability: Used internally by LubaButton, LubaChip, LubaTooltip, and other interactive components.

name: lubaExpandable
description: Adds expand/collapse behavior to any view. Also available as standalone LubaExpandable, LubaExpandableCard, and LubaAccordion components.

variants.name: LubaExpandable
variants.description: Standalone with header and content ViewBuilders, optional chevron

variants.name: LubaExpandableCard
variants.description: Expandable wrapped in a LubaCard with elevation

composability: LubaExpandableCard composes with LubaCard. LubaAccordion manages multiple expand states.

name: lubaSwipeable
description: Adds horizontal swipe actions to any view, like swipe-to-delete in Mail.

presets.name: .unread(action:)
presets.description: Accent envelope badge icon, light haptic

composability: Works on any view. Reveal threshold 60pt, full swipe at 60% width. Max 3 actions per side.

name: lubaShimmerable
description: Applies a shimmer loading effect over any view content.

variants.name: .lubaShimmerable()
variants.description: Shimmer gradient overlay on visible content

composability: Pairs well with LubaSkeleton for loading states. Respects config.animationsEnabled.

name: lubaLongPressable
description: Adds long-press interaction with optional circular progress indicator and dual haptic feedback.

variants.name: LubaLongPressButton
variants.description: Standalone circular button with icon, label, and built-in progress

composability: Timer-based progress (20ms intervals). Minimum duration 0.3s. Press scale 0.95 while held.

name: lubaGlass
description: Applies a glass/frosted effect to any view. Uses SwiftUI materials (iOS 16-25) with native Liquid Glass ready for iOS 26+.

variants.name: .lubaGlass()
variants.description: Apply glass effect to a single view

variants.name: .lubaGlassContainer()
variants.description: Group glass elements for shared compositing (iOS 26+)

composability: Used by LubaButton(.glass), LubaCard(.glass), LubaToast(useGlass:), LubaAlert(useGlass:), LubaSheetHeader(useGlass:), LubaTabs(useGlass:). Solid fallback for reduceTransparency/highContrastMode.

name: LubaButtonStyling
modifier: Protocol â€” not a view modifier
description: Protocol for defining custom button styles. Implement to create brand-specific buttons beyond the built-in 6 styles.

parameters.name: foregroundColor(isPressed:colorScheme:)
parameters.description: Text/icon color based on press state and color scheme

parameters.name: defaultsToFullWidth
parameters.description: Whether button defaults to full width

builtInStyles.name: .primary
builtInStyles.description: Filled accent background, full-width, medium haptic

builtInStyles.name: .secondary
builtInStyles.description: Surface background with border, light haptic

builtInStyles.name: .ghost
builtInStyles.description: Text only, accent color, soft haptic

builtInStyles.name: .subtle
builtInStyles.description: Minimal presence, secondary text color, soft haptic

builtInStyles.name: .glass
builtInStyles.description: Clear background (glass modifier handles visual), light haptic

composability: Any struct conforming to LubaButtonStyling works with LubaButton via the `styling:` parameter.
